alert.note: Alert for Adams; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 10:25PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Phelps, Adams and Kearney Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1024 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Holstein to Holdrege. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Norman around 1030 PM CDT. Holstein around 1035 PM CDT. Roseland around 1040 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Kenesaw, Juniata, Prosser, Hastings and Hansen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
